/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++  -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.14.sdk -dynamiclib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  -o libvpl.dylib -install_name @rpath/libvpl.dylib CMakeFiles/vpl.dir/vpl.cpp.o src/main/cpp/ffmpeg/lib//libavutil.so src/main/cpp/ffmpeg/lib//libavformat.so src/main/cpp/ffmpeg/lib//libavcodec.so
